notes: North Olmsted OH - 4 wards (hybrid: 4 ward + 3 at-large + 1 president = 8 total). Cuyahoga County Planning Commission GIS Commons.
Mayor + 7 council members elected at-large. November 2025 ballot proposal to create wards was defeated. Wayne County.

source: City of Taylor; Ballotpedia; Wave-S Midwest
notes: 7 council members elected at-large to 4-year terms. Chairperson is highest vote-getter. Wayne County.

source: City of Southfield; Ballotpedia; Wave-S Midwest
notes: 7 council members elected at-large to 4-year terms. Low vote-getter gets 2-year term. Oakland County.

source: City of Shaker Heights Charter; Ballotpedia; Wave-S Midwest
notes: Mayor + 7 council members elected at-large on non-partisan basis. Charter adopted 1931, revised 1974, 1986, 1999. Cuyahoga County.
Cleveland Heights OH - Council structure unclear from search. City charter review in progress (2023-2024). Cuyahoga County. May be at-large or ward-based - requires direct verification.
Lakewood OH - 4 wards + 3 at-large = 7 total council members. Hybrid system. No GIS data found in county portals. Cuyahoga County.
Parma OH - 9 wards (all ward-based). No GIS data found in county portals. Cuyahoga County. Population 81,146.
Euclid OH - 8 wards (all ward-based). No GIS data found in county portals. Cuyahoga County. Population 49,692.
Strongsville OH - 4 wards + 3 at-large = 7 total. Hybrid system. Ward boundaries defined by Ordinance No. 2022-048. No GIS data found. Cuyahoga County.
Westlake OH - 6 wards + 1 council president at-large = 7 total. Hybrid system. No GIS data found in county portals. Cuyahoga County.
Solon OH - Ward-based system (at least 7 wards based on odd/even staggered terms). No GIS data found. Charter adopted 1954. Cuyahoga County.
Detroit MI - 7 council districts confirmed via data.detroitmi.gov. 2026 redistricting boundaries active Jan 1, 2026. Existing registry entry is current.
Cuyahoga County Planning GIS Commons has North Olmsted council wards. Other cities (Parma, Euclid, Lakewood, etc.) not found. No county-wide aggregator for city council districts.
SEMCOG (7-county SE Michigan COG) has county boundaries and census data only. No municipal council district data. Individual cities must be queried directly.
Wayne County Open Data has County Commission Districts (15 districts), US/State House/Senate districts. No city council district data for Detroit suburbs.
